problem.p: How do you know that the error is there?

choicegroup.choice: Straightforward application of energy conservation is difficult on a curved track.
We have not connected the distance traveled with the time elapsed.
Energy lost to friction cannot be accounted for; we cannot use energy in this step.
The acceleration of the block changes in an unknown way while it is on the curved slope.
This is an energy problem; the use of force is inappropriate.
